app-development.domainDescription: We’re a passionate team of three, diving deep into the world of app development! Our domain focuses on creating interactive, user-friendly solutions that simplify everyday tasks and enhance connectivity. We also host exciting app dev sessions to exchange ideas, sharpen skills, and inspire innovation—because building great apps starts with a great community!

events.name: Git, Docker and Firebase
events.description: Conducted an interesting session on Git, Docker, and Firebase.

events.name: React Native X Firebase
events.description: We have conducted an interactive session on React Native and Firebase with a demo.

events.name: Flutter X Firebase
events.description: Our team conducted an interactive hands-on development session with Flutter.

ongoingProjects.title: IIT Tirupati Utility App
ongoingProjects.description: A comprehensive app providing centralized file access, transport schedules, event management with notifications, a directory of local services, and optional blog and event scheduler features.

architecture.domainDescription: Explore the cutting-edge technologies behind High-Performance Computing (HPC)! This domain focuses on the principles of CPU and GPU architectures, parallel processing, and system scalability. Learn how modern processors are designed, how GPUs accelerate computations, and how parallel algorithms transform the way we solve large-scale problems. Whether you're passionate about optimizing performance, exploring distributed computing, or advancing HPC applications, this domain provides the knowledge and skills to push the boundaries of computational efficiency.

events.name: Introduction to CUDA Programming
events.description: This session introduced the basics of CUDA programming, focusing on GPU computing and parallel processing concepts. Participants learned foundational skills to write and execute simple CUDA programs, gaining insight into how GPUs accelerate computation. The session provided a starting point for exploring high-performance programming and solving real-world computational challenges.

ongoingProjects.title: Parallel Computing for GANs
ongoingProjects.description: Implementing a Generative Adversarial Network (GAN) using parallel computing techniques to accelerate training, manage larger datasets, and enhance output quality. The project utilizes CUDA for GPU programming and PyTorch for GAN development, requiring access to the Institute's GPU cluster for testing and validation.

competitive-programming.domainDescription: Competitive Programming is a thrilling and mentally engaging domain that focuses on solving algorithmic problems within a competitive setup. The major focus in competitive programming is finding quickly, the most optimized solution by minimizing both space and time complexity through a careful blend of mathematical concepts, data structures and algorithms.

events.name: Introduction to C++ and Basics of CP + Hands-on IDE Install
events.description: The session was designed for beginners to provide a solid foundation in C++ programming, equipping them with practical tips and tricks that are crucial in competitive programming. Topics covered included: Basics of C++, Arrays, Vectors, & STL (Maps and Set), and Strings.

events.name: DSA Workshop Series - Lecture 1: Arrays
events.description: The first session of the DSA Lecture Series focused on Arrays and Strings, covering concepts and hands-on coding. Problem-solving approaches apart from brute-force were discussed in detail. Topics covered included: Arrays (Bit manipulation, Maps, Kadane's Algorithm, and Sliding Window) and Strings.

events.name: Tachyon CP Contest
events.description: As a part of the Tachyon Fest, DW organized a CP contest with a prize pool of ₹10,000. Topics dealt with included: Arrays (2 Pointers and Sieve of Eratosthenes), Bit Manipulation, and Implementation Problems.

ongoingProjects.title: Building Our Own Firewall
ongoingProjects.description: Developing a custom firewall for Windows using driver development techniques, with potential implementation for our college network.

ongoingProjects.title: Website Phishing Detection Model
ongoingProjects.description: Creating a model to identify malicious websites by analyzing web links for phishing characteristics.

software-engineering.domainDescription: The Software Engineering domain at Digital Wizards is dedicated to cultivating technical excellence through innovative projects and skill-building initiatives throughout the year. We strive to equip students with practical knowledge and collaborative experience to thrive in the world of software development by conducting various workshops and sessions.

events.name: Got, GitHub and Open-source
events.description: Join us for an engaging workshop where you'll learn the essentials of Git, GitHub, and Open-source contributions, all while participating in Hacktoberfest 2024! This event is perfect for beginners eager to explore version control and collaborate on real-world projects. You’ll gain hands-on experience in setting up repositories, managing code changes, and making meaningful contributions to open-source software. Let’s celebrate open-source, boost your development skills, and kick-start your journey into the global developer community!

ongoingProjects.title: SkillSync
ongoingProjects.description: An all-in-one platform for programmers and recruiters with personalized spaces, live stats, community features, chats, news feeds, and improvement suggestions.

ongoingProjects.title: Advanced To-Do App
ongoingProjects.description: A task management app offering personal task tracking, group project discussion tools, and assignment deadline tracking.

events.name: Workshop on HTML, CSS and JavaScript
events.description: Learn the fundamentals of web development in this beginner-friendly workshop covering HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Build your first interactive webpage and kick-start your journey into the world of web development!

ongoingProjects.title: Digital Wizards Website
ongoingProjects.description: A comprehensive website featuring an overview, events, team profiles, resources, blogs, alumni highlights, and an admin dashboard for efficient content and member management.

ongoingProjects.title: SkillSync
ongoingProjects.description: An all-in-one platform for programmers and recruiters with personalized spaces, live stats, community features, chats, news feeds, and improvement suggestions.
